item.title: NBA 2K25: MyNBA
item.description: MyNBA is my favorite playing mode in NBA 2K. Starting out as the GM of the Seattle Supersonics in 1983, how well can I steer the franchise? Playing all 82 games per season would need \(82 \text{ games/season} \times 41 \text{ seasons} \times 20 \text{ min/game} \approx 47 \text{ days}\) to catch up to today’s NBA and that’s not accounting for the playoffs. Simulating games is the way to go; might help improve my understanding of the game.
